Adds a watchdog timer object to the watchdog task list.

Removes the specified watchdog task from the watch list.

void Watchdog_StartTask ( WATCHDOG_TASK *  pstTask_  ) 

Enables a watchdog object. Once enabled, the owner task is obliged to meet the deadline it specified when it was added to the list.

Parameters:
pstTask_ -
void Watchdog_Tick ( void   ) 

Controls the system watchdog kick, by ensuring none exceed their deadlines. Called at a regular frequency. Every active timer object in the list is incremented, and if any task has exceeded its deadline time, the function will *not* kick the system WDT - oherwise, the watchdog is kicked. This is especially useful for debugging, where details about the offending task can be logged by the KernelWDT module instead of causing the WDT to expire.
